review: if this is a first step into a larger and more expansive world for lol games then it checks all the boxes and does everything right it has a decent cast of familiar characters simple and effective combat system good music and art style and it brings that unique league of legends art style into a more explorable stage look forward to future entries that slowly build on and add more roleplaying elements

review: solid turnbased rpg with some of your favorite characters from league of legends involving overworld and infight puzzles keeping me mentally engaged with the game  the game itself was pretty fun with great commentary between characters and an incentivization of collecting lore and doing additional puzzles for upgraded gear rewards there is also a fishing minigame if you feel like taking a break from the main game
